metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15592 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing x86 HVM guest OSusers to cause a denial of service (hypervisor crash) or possibly gainprivileges because self-linear shadow mappings are mishandled fortranslated guests.

criterions.comment: xen: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
